ygData.subject: RE: power level to X?/kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Question about kiting. Alot of the DoT spells just got their damage per tick doubles and time halved (or something similar to this - time lessened damage
ygData.messageBody:
Question about kiting. Alot of the DoT spells just got their damage per tick
doubles and time halved (or something similar to this - time lessened damage
upped). Alot of people seem to be pissed bout this in the Shaman community.
I've got a shaman that will hit 19 tonight, and was wondering why people in
the kiting community are mad about this? Only thing I can think of is the
longer it takes to do the damage, the more mana you regain running around.

-Leod, Fennin Ro, SOK

-----Original Message-----
From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 10:06 AM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting


From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>

Kiting. Hit the mob with a spell, usually a damage over time. Run run
run run until the spell wears off. Stop, recast, run some more. Repeat
until OOM or beast is dead. Med up and do it again.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Omeg Felligan [SMTP:omeg_felligan@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 10:06 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting
>
> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> Yet again, stupid question...what exactly is kiting? I get the basic
> "whack
> it and run" but then what? and why run?
>
> Thanks,
> Omeg
>
>
> >Once word: Kiting...
>
